pullRequest.body:
The main addition is `IsTopologicalBasis.inf` (see https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/217875-Is-there-code-for-X.3F/topic/Inf.20of.20a.20pair.20of.20topologies/near/419989448), and I also reordered things to be in the more typical order (deducing the `Pi` version from the `iInf` version rather than the converse).

Also a few extra golfs and variations.

---

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go

using the following format:

- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body:
LGTM but I contributed too much to merge it myself.
maintainer merge
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by urkud.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8309418050/job/22740739650)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8309418050/job/22740739505)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8309418050/job/22740739418)

Could you please add `IsTopologicalBasis.of_hasBasis_nhds` version that assumes `h_open` and your first `have`? While the `HasBasis` assumption is formally stronger (thus the new theorem is weaker), we may have a `HasBasis` statement coming from some generic lemma about `Filter`s.
I originally added this version with the hope that it would simplify some proofs below, but it didn't so I just removed it. I can add it back if you want.
I golfed a bit by using `aesop`. Feel free to revert if you don't like it.
Ah right, I didn't try aesop. I'll have a closer look but it looks good.
Doesn't `@[deprecated] alias a := b` autogenerate correct hint?
Rename to `IsTopologicalBasis.iInf` to allow the new-style dot notation? Also, since you're adding a primed version, please add docstrings explaining the differences.
I guess, this can be called `IsTopologicalBasis.iInf_induced`
Same as `eq_of_nhds_eq_nhds`. Please turn `eq_of_nhds_eq_nhds` into a deprecated alias.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: review and expand API on behavior of topological bases under some constructions
